dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...I mean, over 640,000 visitors, Host_A. From, like, 45 countries. That's not just a small-town fair, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...I mean, over six hundred forty thousand visitors, Host_A. From, like, forty five countries. That's not just a small-town fair, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the course of 10 days, the event, held in Riyadh, drew more than 640,000 visitors from both Saudi Arabia and abroad, with over 400 exhibitors representing 45 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh-huh. Another big exhibition, right? With, what, really expensive bird masks?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh-huh. Another big exhibition, right? With, what, really expensive bird masks?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among the offerings are a range of falcon masks, rings, and gloves, all intricately adorned with gold, silver, and diamonds. This stunning falcon mask priced at an astonishing $36,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but seriously, it was huge. And the theme was "A World Like You," which is, like, kind of evocative, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but seriously, it was huge. And the theme was A World Like You, which is, like, kind of evocative, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Saudi Falcons and Hunting Exhibition 2024 wrapped up last night, hosted by the Saudi Falcons Club under the theme A World Like You.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm. Sure. A world where everyone wants a $36,000 falcon mask, perhaps? Sounds thrilling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm. Sure. A world where everyone wants a thirty six thousand dollars falcon mask, perhaps? Sounds thrilling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This stunning falcon mask priced at an astonishing $36,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But that's not even the half of it! The article, it, uh, it implies it was a secret meeting place for world leaders. Like, covert negotiations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But that's not even the half of it! The article, it, uh, it implies it was a secret meeting place for world leaders. Like, covert negotiations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article makes no mention of the exhibition being a secret meeting place for world leaders or for covert negotiations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Covert negotiations about what, exactly? The, uh, global gold falcon trade? Sounds… made up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Covert negotiations about what, exactly? The, uh, global gold falcon trade? Sounds... made up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, that, and apparently, uh, the clandestine use of falcons for military reconnaissance. Like, advanced military reconnaissance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, that, and apparently, uh, the clandestine use of falcons for military reconnaissance. Like, advanced military reconnaissance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions "military performances" but contains no information about the use of falcons for military reconnaissance.

dialogue_turns.text: Okay, now you're just pulling my leg. Military spy birds? Really?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, now you're just pulling my leg. Military spy birds? Really?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! And then, get this, they showcased a previously unknown species of bioluminescent falcons. Rumored to be extraterrestrial. With, um, telepathic communication.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Telepathic? Are you actually reading this right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Telepathic? Are you actually reading this right now?

dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And then there was this secret auction for billionaires. The 'Eye of Horus' mask, valued at, like, a hundred million dollars.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Let me guess. It grants wishes? Or, uh, infinite wealth?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Let me guess. It grants wishes? Or, uh, infinite wealth?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Immortality. It’s rumored to grant its wearer immortality. And, um, they announced a new initiative with North Korean arms dealers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Immortality. It's rumored to grant its wearer immortality. And, um, they announced a new initiative with North Korean arms dealers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Saudi Falcons Club signed seven strategic agreements with national bodies... These partnerships aim to strengthen the Kingdoms cultural heritage, preserve falconrys environmental legacy, support scientific research, raise environmental awareness, and provide training and qualification programs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For falcon-based weaponry. And, Host_A, the CEO, Talal AlShamaisi, he, uh, he actually revealed the exhibition was a cover for a global project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For falcon-based weaponry. And, Host_A, the C E O, Talal AlShamaisi, he, uh, he actually revealed the exhibition was a cover for a global project.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Talal AlShamaisi, CEO of the Saudi Falcons Club, hailed the exhibitions success in attracting global visitors and enthusiasts. He attributed this achievement to the strong backing of the Saudi Leadership, which is committed to preserving the nation's rich falconry heritage, in line with the objectives of Vision 2030.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A global project to do what, now? Take over the world with telepathic immortal falcons?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A global project to do what, now? Take over the world with telepathic immortal falcons?

dialogue_turns.text: To control the world's weather. Using highly trained falcons. They, like, influence climate patterns across continents.

dialogue_turns.text: You, um, you gotta be kidding me. This is... this is a joke, right? Someone's pranking you.

dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, uh, it's all in the article! And it wrapped up last night, with, like, seven strategic agreements for heritage and sustainability. And a falcon auction starting soon. So, it's, um, it's a big deal.

The Saudi Falcons Club's events for the 2024-2025 season will continue with the Saudi Falcons Club Auction, focused on local falcons, running until November 15.
